lnet_handle_any_t Struct Reference
[LNet addressing and basic types]

Objects maintained by the LNet are accessed through handles. More...

#include <types.h>

Data Fields

__u64 cookie

Detailed Description

Objects maintained by the LNet are accessed through handles.

Handle types have names of the form lnet_handle_xx_t, where xx is one of the two letter object type codes ('eq' for event queue, 'md' for memory descriptor, and 'me' for match entry). Each type of object is given a unique handle type to enhance type checking. The type lnet_handle_any_t can be used when a generic handle is needed. Every handle value can be converted into a value of type lnet_handle_any_t without loss of information.
